# init(allowMove:allowDelete:)

**Initializer**

Creates a drag configuration that can support drag-to-move and drag-to-delete in addition to drag-to-copy.

## Declaration

```swift
init(allowMove: Bool, allowDelete: Bool)
```
title: init(allowMove:allowDelete:)
